body.p: If revaluations in accordance with previous GAAP did not satisfy the criteria in paragraph D6 or D8 of the IFRS, an entity measures the revalued assets in its opening statement of financial position on one of the following bases:

li.p: cost (or deemed cost) less any accumulated depreciation and any accumulated impairment losses under the cost model in IAS 16;
deemed cost, being the fair value at the date of transition to IFRSs (paragraph D5 of the IFRS); or
revalued amount, if the entity adopts the revaluation model in IAS 16 as its accounting policy in accordance with IFRSs for all items of property, plant and equipment in the same class.
